titleStmt.title: The precepts of the excellent clerke [and] graue philosopher Plutarche for the preseruation of good healthe
De tuenda sanitate praecepta. English.
titleStmt.author: Plutarch.
Hales, John, d. 1571.

notesStmt.note: An translation, by John Hales, of: Plutarch. De tuenda sanitate praecepta.
At foot of title page: Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
